title: Thicker Than Blood
description: A collection of dark tales.  Thicker Than Blood Twin girls embark on a journey of fear, discovery, and death.  Where is Katie? This little girl is more than what she seems. What is she hiding?  The Galloway Lake There are rumors that the Galloway Lake is haunted. Tanya wakes up to find herself drowning in it. Can she survive this horrific night?
author: K.N. Lee
